title: She Loves to Cook, and She Loves to Eat, Vol. 1
description: Nomoto may be an amateur chef, but she dreams bigâ€”at least in terms of food portions. Unfortunately, her appetite isn't as large as her imagination, so she can't give her masterpieces the full enjoyment they deserve. Luckily, one evening, she finds the perfect audience in her neighbor, Kasuga, who just happens to love eating. As this important gourmet duo warms up to each other, could tender feelings be brewing?
author: Sakaomi Yuzaki
